ScriptSample.Name: Exchange-2013-Prerequisites-3f8651b9
ScriptSample.Title: Exchange 2013 - Prerequisites install & configuration for Windows Server 2012/R2
ScriptSample.Author: Benoit HAMET - MVP
ScriptSample.Summary: This PowerShell script download, install and configure all prerequisites for Exchange 2013 on Windows Server 2012 and Windows Server 2012 R2 (if using Exchange 2013 SP1 Binaries)It has been updated to include the new Exchange 2013 Edge Role (if using Exchange 2013 SP1)The script
